name: Osprey Kestrel 48 Backpack - Men's
description: A versatile pack with cross-over potential. Great for gear-intensive trips to climb or tag summits, or for pared-back overnight backpacking, this pack easily handles up to 16kg. The LightWire™ frame transfers weight to a comfortable harness and hipbelt, and multiple access options lets you get to your gear without having to unpack everything.Peripheral frame and framesheet transfers load to the hipbelt.Ridged foam back panel vents heat.Height-adjustable harness provides a fine-tuned fit.Side zipper for additional access to main compartment.Bottom zippered compartment provides a dedicated home for your sleeping bag.Stretch-mesh front and side pockets to stash gear on the fly.Stow-on-the-Go trekking pole attachments let you stash your poles without removing the pack.Bottom sleeping bag straps, front daisy chain and lid webbing loops let you lash on extra gear.External-access hydration sleeve makes refilling easy and protects pack contents from spills.Integrated rain cover keeps your stuff dry during rainy trips.
